Plot: A New Orleans DA discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.
Title: JFK
Writer: Oliver Stone (screenplay), Zachary Sklar (screenplay), Jim Garrison (book), Jim Marrs (book)
Actors: Sally Kirkland, Anthony Ramirez, Ray LePere, Steve Reed
tomatoConsensus: As history, Oliver Stone's JFK is dubious, but as filmmaking it's electric, cramming a ton of information and excitement into its three-hour runtime and making great use of its outstanding cast.
